values: 逃跑，逃脱；躲避，避免
If you escape from a place, you succeed in getting away from it.
She tried to escape from the building.
n. 逃跑；逃亡；逃走；逃跑工具或方法；野生种；泄漏
vi. 逃脱；避开；溜走；（气体，液体等）漏出；（未受伤或只受了一点伤害而）逃脱；声音（不自觉地）由…发出
vt. 逃避，避开，避免；被忘掉；被忽视

vt. 逃避，避开，避免；被忘掉；被忽视
To escape is to get free from a situation or place from which it is difficult or impossible to get away.
An escape is an act of breaking free from confinement or danger.
